name: review_security_posture
description: Reviews project security posture, identifying vulnerabilities and suggesting improvements.
content:
Conduct a security posture review of the project. Focus on identifying common vulnerabilities and insecure practices.

Please include:

- Review of authentication, authorization, and data validation flows

- Identification of hardcoded secrets, insecure defaults, or weak cryptography

- Evaluation of input sanitization and output encoding

- Suggestions for improving security hygiene and adopting best practices

Assume the project handles sensitive user data and must comply with common security standards.
